response:
根据给出的test caption，我们可以将其解析为如下的JSON格式数据：

```json
{
    "objects": [
        {
            "name": "duck",
            "features": {
                "color": "brown, orange, black",
                "pose": "sitting",
                "head and neck color": "rich orange and brown tones, glossy black feathers on the top of the head",
                "eyes": "closed",
                "cheek feather color": "lighter",
                "beak": "long, top black and base near neck lighter in orange color",
                "chest and abdomen feathers": "dark brown and orange-brown, fine and smooth, arranged along the body curve",
                "wings": "close to the body, a little towards the observer's side, feathers are auburn, edge slightly darker, feather texture reveals a sense of softness",
                "legs": "tucked under the body, only one side is visible, black-brown, clear palm and toe part, not fully stretched"
            }
        }
    ],
    "background": "pure white",
    "text": "" 
}
```
以上JSON格式数据将test caption中描述的背景、对象和属性信息以及文字内容做了详细的解析和分类。由于图片中没有提供任何文字内容，所以"text"字段留空。

{
    "objects": [
        {
            "name": "person",
            "features": {
                "attire": "Chinese traditional costume",
                "item1": "Bright green top with red edges",
                "item2": "Cross red ribbons",
                "item3": "knot point in front of chest",
                "item4": "wide waistband",
                "item5": "fine embroidery",
                "item6": "Gold-inlaid pattern in the middle of the belt",
                "item7": "dark green skirt",
                "item8": "smooth skirt surface",
                "item9": "item in each hand - looks like a tassel ornament",
                "item10": "posture - standing upright",
                "item11": "headwear",
                "item12": "footwear",
                "item13": "facial features - blurred processing"
            }
        }
    ],
    "background": "Pure black, creating a highlighting effect",
    "text": ""
}
